structures.title: ONLINE IELTS SIMULATION (O.I.S)
structures.description:
Welcome to our Online Simulation, the online simulation is designed to test your capability in handling the IELTS type of test. All of the questions are sourced from the existing database taken from various books of IELTS preparation (particularly the Cambridge IELTS series Academic and General Training with Answer books) . The online simulation test that will be tested in O.I.S is Listening, Reading, Writing and Speaking test (per-request of the participant and also via Video/voice call). At the end of the test, participant will receive their True and False result from Listening & Reading tests, the writing test will be assessed differently and speaking will be on the spot assessment by our professional IELTS tutor. After that in the next 4 days of working Best Partner Education will send the participant the Online Simulation Result (O.S.R) to the participant personal email.
Before you start the test there are several disclosures that the participant must understand before commencing to the practice test:
  1. The O.I.S act as an initial capability measurement not as the real official test result, meaning that the O.S.R can only be used as a personal measurement and may not be used to fulfill a certain requirement in applying for a job, scholarship, fellowship or any related/similar programs.
  2. The creation of O.I.S is to ease applicant from rural and resided far from Best partner Education main office (Pontianak) or Branch (Singkawang). Meaning that only participant located outside from the mentioned location may take the O.I.S However, the rules will not apply if there is a special request or certain condition to fulfill before the commencement of O.I.S
  3. The O.I.S may never be used outside of the Best Partner Education environment, meaning that the O.I.S can only be used internally to: 1. check participants initial English capability through IELTS system, 2. The result to be used as further consultation material to set the participants to the correct preparation or language class in Best partner Education, 3. The result can be used to help the local education institution (school/college) to help them measuring their students’ English capability.
  4. Best Partner Education (BPE) clearly states that the O.S.R cannot be used for any other purpose outside of BPE environment and the O.S.R may not be used for scholarship, Fellowship, school/university/job application.

Good Luck with the test participants and Get your Best score.

Please listen to the audio before moving on to the test!

structures.instruction: Please listen to the audio carefully and record your answer after listening to the question given in the audio!
Please listen to the instruction and record your answer after you read the question in the picture!

structures.title: PART 3 ONLINE SPEAKING TEST
structures.instruction: Please listen carefully to the audio before recording your answer!
